Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I feel that GenAI is more thorough with the feedback eg. can provide advice on every little detail. It is not always practical to ask this of a human teacher, but human feedback is more personal and I value it more than from AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: i get instant feedback from GenAI compared to sometimes weeks going by before hearing back from a teacher
